content: The remote object has to either extend the java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject object, or be explicitly exported by calling the java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject.exportObject() method.
stemmed: the remot object either extend java.rmi.server.unicastremoteobject object , explicitli export call java.rmi.server.unicastremoteobject.exportobject ( ) method .
